en.donate:chooseFrequency: You can make a one-time donation or a monthly donation.
en.donate:errorMessage: The service is temporarily unavailable, please try later
en.donate:feeDisclaimer: The Stripe handling fee deducted from a donation is 1.75% + 30¢ for Australian cards, and 2.9% + 30¢ for International cards, plus a 1.8% currency conversion fee when applicable.
en.donate:storageDisclaimer: SuttaCentral does not handle or store your credit card details. All credit card transactions are handled securely by Stripe.
